A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
**Spoilers!**
I am a huge fan of Star Wars and I'm shocked how terrible this film is. Disney is slowly destroying a legacy. Here is a small list of the issues: 

1. The Death of Snoke - Really? Just kill him off without giving any more info on his background? Why build him up so quickly kill him off?
2. The Death of Luke\, Luke's Legacy\, Luke's Behavior - Luke Skywalker was not in this movie. I have no idea who this 'Luke' imposter was.
3. Finn & Rose's Subplot - Added nothing to the film/story.
4. The Casino Scene - Again\, added nothing to the film/story. 
5. Rey's Parents are Nobody - They built up Rey's background as a point of interest in 7 just to confirm in 8 she is a nobody.
6. Death & Return of Leia - Superman anyone? 
7. Death of Phasma - Again\, another pointless character that could've been awesome.
8. Comedy Relief - There was way too much of this and at the wrong times. 
9. Dropped Force Awakens Subplots.
10. SO many plot holes.

There are more issues with this story/film\, but I'm not going to waste any more time. It's almost as if Geroge Lucas was involved in the making of Episode 8. It's like we're reliving Episode 1 all over again.
